Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: This has been implemented, but not pushing for the moment. Want to do some performance testing to verify the additional complexity and mangling of the logs is justified by the improved performance.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Because of pending changes to the MSP interface, integrating this work into v1.1 is likely to simply cause more problems down the line. Moving to the backlog.
